item.title: 01. Reconnaissance
item.description: Reconnaissance Certificate Transparency Logs The art of Credential Gathering. Credential Gathering The art of Credential Gathering. DNS Recon DNS Recon, if you don't know where stuff is its gonna get hard to hack it. E-Mail Gathering If you know e-mail addresses you know naming conventions and possible even passwords. Google Dorking
